Room.Name: Avernus
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the westernmost point of the first plane of Hell, Avernus.
Room.LongDescription: Being so far away from the center of Avernus, most of the creatures in this plane will leave you alone, assuming you are planning to leave the plane, and not just regroup for a later attack. Nevertheless, you have been granted a slight rest, but remember, the monsters are also regrouping while you wait around.
